body_html:
I'm looking at the cmake windows build again. A couple of changes were necessary in the download_dependencies.sh to get that tflite-windows branch to work. I update GEMMLOWP_URL to the current one used in tensorflow/workspace.bzl. It was necessary to get rid of the pthread references. I also backed up the FLATBUFFERS_URL to 1.8.0, since tflite apparently is not compatible with the latest flatbuffer.

GEMMLOWP_URL="https://mirror.bazel.build/github.com/google/gemmlowp/archive/38ebac7b059e84692f53e5938f97a9943c120d98.zip"

FLATBUFFERS_URL="https://github.com/google/flatbuffers/archive/v1.8.0.zip"

Also, just as a note, you have to run this download_dependencies.sh from the tensorflow root. I don't think I saw that mentioned anywhere.

Also you need to build googletest somewhere with options compatible. With these changes, the tflite-windows branch, from below link, passed 40 of 41 tests executing in msvc environment. The skip_gram_test fails ... haven't looked at that yet.

https://github.com/shaurya0/tensorflow/tree/tflite-windows

FLATBUFFERS_URL="https://github.com/google/flatbuffers/archive/v1.8.0.zip"
Also, just as a note, you have to run this download_dependencies.sh from the tensorflow root.  I don't think I saw that mentioned anywhere.
Also  you need to build googletest somewhere with options compatible.  With these changes, the tflite-windows branch, from below link,  passed 40 of 41 tests executing in msvc environment.  The skip_gram_test fails ... haven't looked at that yet.
https://github.com/shaurya0/tensorflow/tree/tflite-windows
body:
I'm looking at the cmake windows build again.  A couple of changes were necessary in the download_dependencies.sh to get that tflite-windows branch to work. I update GEMMLOWP_URL to the current one used in tensorflow/workspace.bzl.  It was necessary to get rid of the pthread references.  I also backed up the FLATBUFFERS_URL to 1.8.0, since tflite apparently is not compatible with the latest flatbuffer.

GEMMLOWP_URL="https://mirror.bazel.build/github.com/google/gemmlowp/archive/38ebac7b059e84692f53e5938f97a9943c120d98.zip"

FLATBUFFERS_URL="https://github.com/google/flatbuffers/archive/v1.8.0.zip"

Also, just as a note, you have to run this download_dependencies.sh from the tensorflow root.  I don't think I saw that mentioned anywhere.

Also  you need to build googletest somewhere with options compatible.  With these changes, the tflite-windows branch, from below link,  passed 40 of 41 tests executing in msvc environment.  The skip_gram_test fails ... haven't looked at that yet.

https://github.com/shaurya0/tensorflow/tree/tflite-windows
